PROMOTES STRONG BONES & EXCELLENT ABSORPTION: Contains essential Calcium and Vitamin D for strong bone growth. Made with No Palm Olein Oil to support excellent calcium absorption, just like all Similac formulas.
TRUSTED & HOSPITAL-PREFERRED BRAND: Similac is the #1 infant formula brand fed in hospitals and has been providing babies with a strong start for over 100 years.

BRAIN NOURISHING DHA: Has DHA to help support brain and eye development. Fat is 5.1 gram per 100 Calories
DUAL PREBIOTIC FORMULA: Gentle milk formula with probiotics & vitamins for immune health and complete nutrition tailored for your baby's growth through their first 12 months
COMPLETE BABY NUTRITION: Easy to digest proteins with benefits of rice cereal without the hassle or nutritional imbalance
TOP BRAND OF FORMULA FOR SPIT-UP/COMMON REFLUX: Meets reflux reduction guidelines, as set by the American Academy of Pediatrics
RECOMMENDED BY PEDIATRICIANS: Enfamil is the No.1 Infant Formula brand recommended by pediatricians

product_description: Product Description Enfamil A.R. Infant Formula is specially formulated with a thicker consistency to reduce spit-up by over 50% while providing complete nutrition for your infant up to 12 months, unlike just adding rice cereal to formula. Spit-up is common side effect of your baby's developing digestive system. But, a switch to Enfamil A.R. Infant Formula can make a difference. Based on a clinical study of Enfamil A.R. Infant Formula before the addition of DFIA, ARA, and prebiotics with infants who spit up frequently (5 or more spit-ups per day), comparing frequency and volume of spitup after feeding Enfamil A.R. to the same babies at the beginning of the study Formula for spit-up defined as rice-thickened formula Brand Story By Enfamil

name: Earth's Best Organic Baby Formula for Babies 0-12 Months, Powdered Dairy Infant Formula with Iron, Omega-3 DHA, and Omega-6 ARA, 32 oz Formula Container
short_description: Nutrition First: Made with organic* milk from grass and grain-fed cows (!), our Dairy Infant Formula with Iron has lutein, prebiotics, and DHA and ARA to give your baby nutrients that support the body’s defenses, brain, and eye development
Like Breast Milk: This formula is our closest to breast milk and contains no added corn syrup. This easy-to-digest (1) formula meets FDA requirements for infant nutrition****

Made for Ages and Stages: Dairy Infant Formula is great for supplementing breastfeeding or as a replacement to nourish your baby for the first year until they are ready to transition to whole milk or a milk alternative

Easy Prep: The container has simple instructions explaining the water-to-formula ratio, which allows you to prepare your baby’s bottle in a few simple steps. When properly diluted, this container will make approximately 155 fl. oz. of formula

Good Food Made Fun: Earth’s Best Organic has a complete collection of organic* baby food, formula, and toddler snacks. Choose from baby food for ages 4 to 24 months, puree pouches, gentle baby formula, baby cereal, pus, finger foods, and much more
Clean Label Project Purity Awarded – Verified to meet strict standards for ingredient purity and safety
Recognized as Best Organic Baby Formula of 2025 by What to Expect, according to pediatricians and moms
Named Best Organic Baby Formula of 2024 by BabyCenter
product_description: Your little one's dietary needs are unique, so their formula should be, too. Our formulas at Earth's Best Organic are available in a variety of options to fit dietary restrictions like lactose sensitivity and intolerance and sensitive stomachs, making it easy to choose what’s best for your baby's nourishment. This formula contains a dairy-based powder enriched with iron, Omega-3 DHA, and Omega-6 ARA to provide essential nutrients for your little one's growth and development. Sourced from organic milk* from grass and grain-fed cows**, it’s fortified with lutein, prebiotics, and vital fatty acids to support your baby's development. This formula most closely mimics breast milk of all of our formulas while meeting FDA standards for infant nutrition****. Whether used to supplement breastfeeding or as the primary source of nutrition, this formula is tailored to nourish your baby until the transition to whole milk. Discover our range of Earth's Best Organics products, including baby food, formula, and toddler snacks, providing a wholesome and enjoyable feeding experience for your little one. *Certified Organic Quality Assurance International (!) Made with Organic milk from grass & grain-fed cows by Hain Celestial (1) Like all infant formulas (Ceritifcation Date: 7/25/2012) ****All infant formulas sold in the U.S. meet FDA requirements *****Ingredients not genetically engineered

name: Amazon Brand - Mama Bear Sensitivity Premium Infant Formula Powder with Iron, Dual HMOs for Immune Support, Non-GMO, for Fussiness and Gas from Lactose Sensitivity, 33.2 Ounce (Pack of 1)
short_description: COMPLETE NUTRITION: Mama Bear Sensitivity Premium provides complete nutrition for baby's first year; this enhanced formula has multi HMOs versus our single HMO formulation; compare to the nutrition of Similac Pro-Sensitive

SOOTHES SENSITIVE TUMMIES: With 99 percent less lactose than standard milk-based formula, each serving provides complete nutrition while easing fussiness and gas; suitable for little ones aged 0-12 months with lactose sensitivity

IMMUNE AND DIGESTIVE SUPPORT: Enhanced with dual HMOs, 2'-FL and LNnT, immune supporting prebiotics commonly found in breast milk; HMOs aid the growth of beneficial bacteria in baby's digestive tract for immune support and digestive health

TRUSTED INGREDIENTS FOR GROWTH: Includes DHA, Lutein, Vitamin E and Choline to help support brain and eye development; non-GMO, ingredients not genetically engineered; no artificial growth hormones or palm olein oil

SNAP ELIGIBLE: This infant formula can be purchased with Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) benefits; like all U.S. infant formulas, Mama Bear Sensitivity Premium Baby Formula meets the same FDA and quality standards as the national brands
product_description: Compare to the nutrition of Similac Pro-Sensitive Infant Formula. With 99 percent less lactose than standard milk-based formula, and enhanced with double the HMOs versus our prior single HMO formula, Mama Bear Sensitivity Premium provides complete nutrition for lactose-sensitive babies aged 0-12 months. HMOs are immune supporting prebiotics commonly found in breast milk, and the dual HMOs in this baby formula, LNnT and 2’-FL, support immune system and digestive health by aiding the growth of beneficial bacteria in baby's digestive tract. DHA, Lutein and Vitamin E are included for brain and eye development. To help promote calcium absorption for strong bones, this formula does not contain palm olein oil. Non-GMO, ingredients genetically not engineered, and this baby formula also has no artificial growth hormones. Certified Kosher by the Orthodox Union - OU-D. No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows. HMOs: Human Milk Oligosaccharide (HMO); not from human milk. This product is not manufactured or distributed by the owner of the registered trademark Similac Pro-Sensitive. Mama Bear Sensitivity Premium Infant Formula does not contain the identical proprietary ingredient blend of prebiotics, patented levels of nucleotides, lutein and lycopene in Similac Pro-Sensitive.

product_description: Product Description Enfamil Gentlease baby formula is gentle nutrition for sensitive tummies. This infant formula is clinically shown to ease fussiness, crying, gas, and spit-up within 24 hours, so you can feel good about what’s in the bottle and how baby feels after. Our proteins are easy to digest to help reduce common feeding discomfort—while still delivering complete, balanced nutrition for infants from birth to 12 months. Backed by decades of research, Enfamil Gentlease baby formula has important nutrients also found in breast milk: DHA and choline to support brain development and iron and essential vitamins and minerals for healthy growth and immune support. It’s a gentle choice that brings comfort without compromise—nourishing your little one through their first year. Manufacturer Contact Information Orrville, OH 44667 USA

name: Baby's Only Complete Nutrition Infant Formula, Milk Based Powder with Iron, Modeled After Mother’s Milk, Iron, Choline, Vitamin D, Baby Formula for Newborn to 12 Months Old Infant, 21 oz, 1 Pack
short_description: FORMULA FOR ALL: We modeled our Complete Nutrition Infant Formula after mother’s milk. It's a recipe we're proud of made with only fine ingredients and clinically backed to support infant growth and development.

COMPLETE AND BALANCED NUTRITION FOR OPTIMAL GROWTH: Our simple-ingredient baby formula powder offers an industry leading levels of fat blend, organic oils, iron, choline, and vitamin D to nourish your baby through their first year of life.

GIVE YOUR INFANT A CLEAN START: Quality, organic ingredients are a must when it comes to your infants. Our classic milk-based infant formula doesn’t contain corn syrup, palm oil, artificial colors, sweeteners or growth hormones.
EASY TO PREPARE THE INFANT FORMULA: Add 1 unpacked, level scoop of Baby's Only Formula powder for each 2 fl oz of water. Place the cap on your bottle and shake well until the powder is dissolved.

COMMITTED TO SAFETY: Your little one means the world to you, and that means the world to us. That's why our products are meticulously crafted in small batches at our state-of-the-art facility in Ohio and rigorously examined to ensure we never compromise on purity, safety, and quality.
SUBSCRIBE & SAVE: Choose Subscribe and Save for additional savings and convenience.

TRUSTED BRAND: With over 20 years of experience, Baby's Only is now available in a kosher version, a special production certified by Badatz & OU. It is also Certified Cholov Yisroel and is Kosher for Passover, Kitnios.
